captions.text:
Hello DisneyCarToys here today we are going
to play with this Sofia the First Wooden doll

dress up set, it has 25 pieces of magnetic
clothing. So lets open this thing up and if

you are interested in buying this I actually
bought this at Kohls. I'm sure you can buy

it online at Ebay and Amazon. And you can
see just behind its magnets set a lot of dolls

and the Peppa Pig family sitting behind me
here. And I would like them to help me pick

the outfits and help judge the outfits. It
will be a lot of fun. So lets get Sofia out

She comes with her traditional outfit and
underneath is this cute PJ. We also have this

little wooden stand. And check out all this
clothing, wooo. Look she has shirts and gloves

I will shower you everything in a second but
that is a lot. Here is Sofia in her jamies

they are really pretty I love the color but
lets get her dressed up. But let me show you

first what we have. We have four skirts to
choose from going from the skinny shirt to

puffy puffy puffy, she has five different
tops to choose from. And probably the worlds

biggest winter hat. And the match her outfits,
she had three pairs of long gloves and also

three school bags. Plus some more accessories
some scrolls and school books. And yummy chocolate

cake. and glasses and tea pots. Now it is
time to dress up Sofia. I am going to put

in her traditional outfit, this is kind of
what you see in the theme song of the show.

And really throughout the show in different
events. Her purple dress with her amulet and

with her dress I am going to give her her
gloves. So guys what do you think. I think

this outfit is quite beautiful. I think she
needs something litter something she can run

around in and use her legs. And enjoy being
a human. Alright lets give Sofia something

lighter then we really only have skirts as
options. But I can giver her, her least full

skirt which is her yellow one. I love yellow.
She still has her amulet with her top and

we'll give her some yellow gloves with the
outfit. That is super cute, I do love the

color pink and yellow but I don't know if
yellow is Sofia color. hey I like the color

yellow it matches my hair and my fin. Alright
let's take off this yellow dress and we'll

give Sofia something completely different.
Let's go for winter theme here, I'll give

her her traditional purple skirt but this
fuzzy top with a pink bow. And the world largest

hat, but then again her head is huge way bigger
then her body. This outfit is way to wintery

I think you need a little less winter and
more super. Well Spiderman I don't have anything

super or super hero theme but I can give her
a school girl outfit. So here's a little purple

top with a corset and a backpack. She looks
like a very good student probably as good

as my Peppa. Well Sofia is a really good student.
To honor Peppa Pig let's give Sofia a pink

outfit. To match Peppa's skin its lovely pink
skirt and a super ruffly top with a purple

bow. I'll give her, her little tea set. And
she's ready for a party look eve a purple

cake. If Sofia ever went to my castle I would
hope she would bring a delicious cake just

like that. Ahh that's cute Elsa I am sure
Sofia would shes very sweet. Let's take off

this outfit and we'll get Sofia ready for
school again. She spends a lot of time learning

she's still young, so lets give her this outfit.
The top is yellow and pink the little bit

of pink on the top matches the skirt. We'll
give her her school books. And this little

school. Please let us know in the comments
which outfit was your favorite also press

right up here in the top corner on the Cookie
Monster and you can click to subscribe there

oh and don't forget to like this video.Click
on a picture to watch another fun toy video.
Thanks for watching and have a great day!

title: Sofia The First Doll with Peppa Pig, Mermaid Oona, Lego Duplo Spiderman and Frozen Elsa Magnet Doll
